original_title: Fire on the Mountain: Celebrating 25 Years of Smoky Mountain Wrestling
overview: Fire On The Mountain: Celebrating 25 Years of Smoky Mountain Wrestling. Hosted by Matt Striker, starring Jim Cornette and special guests Tracy Smothers, Bobby Blaze, Bobby Fulton, Dr. Tom Prichard and Dutch Mantell.  This amazing event took place WrestleCade Weekend 2017 at the Benton Convention Center in Winston-Salem, NC. WARNING: STRONG ADULT LANGUAGE.
title: Fire on the Mountain: Celebrating 25 Years of Smoky Mountain Wrestling
